 2008-01702008-01-29,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of GUY GIGUÈRE to be a full-time permanent member of the Public Service Staffing Tribunal to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and designation of GUY GIGUÈRE to be Chairperson of the Public Service Staffing Tribunal, effective March 29, 2008.
